strapiPost.title: Lineus Medical Receives New Patents
strapiPost.content:
Lineus Medical, a healthcare startup in Fayetteville, received two new patents on products that reduce complications with medical lines like IVs and had research published in a veterinary medical journal. 

  • Products: Lineus received a Japanese patent for the SafeBreak Vascular, a break-away medical device that helps protect peripheral IV lines, and they received a U.S. utility patent for the Bifurcated Venous Access Device, a dual-lumen peripheral IV catheter. 
  • Research: The Journal of American Veterinary Medical Association recently published the results of a study including 367 dogs who used the SafeBreak Vascular device, the study showed that the breakaway device reduced complications by 65%. 

Read the Talk Business & Politics article HERE.
